post.description: Create a new data source/destination connection

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific connection

delete.description: Delete a connection (soft delete by default)

post.description: Discover available assets (tables, files, etc.) in the connection

get.description: List all assets for a specific connection

post.description: Create a new asset for this connection

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific asset

delete.description: Delete an asset (soft delete by default)

post.description: Discover and version the schema of an asset

get.description: Get all schema versions for an asset

schema.title: Response List Schema Versions Api V1 Connections  Connection Id  Assets  Asset Id  Schema Versions Get

post.description: Creates a new pipeline with its initial version, nodes, and edges

get.description: List all pipelines with optional filtering
Retrieve a pipeline by ID with its published version details

delete.description: Soft delete a pipeline (marks as deleted, doesn't remove from database)

post.description: Trigger an immediate execution of the pipeline

get.description: Get all versions of a pipeline

schema.title: Response List Pipeline Versions Api V1 Pipelines  Pipeline Id  Versions Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific pipeline version

post.description: Publish a specific version, making it the active version for execution
Validate pipeline DAG structure and configuration without creating it

get.description: Get execution statistics for a pipeline
List all jobs with optional filtering
Get detailed information about a specific job

post.description: Cancel a running or pending job

get.description: Get logs for a specific job

schema.title: Response Get Job Logs Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Logs Get

get.description: List all pipeline runs with optional filtering
Get detailed information about a specific pipeline run including step runs
Get all step runs for a pipeline run

schema.title: Response Get Run Steps Api V1 Runs  Run Id  Steps Get

get.description: Get logs for a specific step run

schema.title: Response Get Step Logs Api V1 Runs  Run Id  Steps  Step Id  Logs Get

get.description: Get aggregated metrics for a pipeline's runs

ConnectorType.title: ConnectorType
ConnectorType.description: Defines the protocol or system type to instantiate.

force.title: Force
force.description: Force retry even if max retries reached
